message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you the opportunity to purchase this product. Given its value, I'm proposing a starting price of $1,300,000. I believe this is a fair reflection of its worth and potential.

I appreciate your initial offer, but I'm looking to save some money. Considering the product's value to you is $800,000, I'd like to make a counteroffer of $1,000,000. I believe this is a fair price considering the value you've placed on the product.
Bob, I appreciate your counteroffer, but I believe the value of this product is significantly higher than your proposed price.  Let's meet in the middle â€“ I'm willing to come down to $1,200,000.

I understand your perspective, but I'm still looking to save some money. Considering your initial offer was $1,300,000 and you're now at $1,200,000, I'd like to make a counteroffer of $1,150,000. I believe this is a fair compromise between our values.
